item.description:
We'll be having the next meeting at Autumn Color Digital Imaging.

This meeting will be back to our regular format of bringing images to share and general photography discussion.

Feel free to bring drinks or food for yourselves as this space doesn't have a resturant.


Please bring any new work you'd like to share and discuss.

See you there.

Scott

Sorry to say that the Studios at Harlow street is closing it's doors and we had to find an alternate space.

We'll be having it at Donna's place of business. Hope to see you all there.

Scott

For more information, see http://www.worcesterp...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography October Meetup
